titles.title: To repeal the Second Chance Amendment Act of 2022 and the Incarceration Reduction Amendment Act of 2016.
To repeal the Second Chance Amendment Act of 2022 and the Incarceration Reduction Amendment Act of 2016.

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 24 - 20.
